description:
As an established songwriter, I take you through my writing process and what has help me to write my best songs. Learn the process necessary for writing your own songs that you can connect with as well as your audience, including how to find what to write about and the structure of songs.

About the Course

You too can be a songwriter! Yes, you! This course is to help you bring out the inner songwriter that has been hiding and ready to bust out. All you have to do is commit, stay focus, and utilize the tools given in this course and you will be on your way to becoming a songwriter.

If you are new to songwriting, this course will show you how to get started and get the creative process started. If you are already a song writer, you may pick up some tips to help fine tune the process you already have.

No matter if your goal is to write for major artists, create your own music project, or just a hobby, understanding the process will help you get over your fear and creative hump. Where do you start? How exactly do you know if your song will be received with a great response? What makes a song stand the test of time? Songwriting will require research on your part but you will soon realize all songs are the same.

This course is designed for the musician and non-musician. It is not necessary that you play an instrument to be able to write a song. If you play an instrument, you have the advantage of creating your own instrumental to write your songs to. If you donâ€™t play, this course highlights how do you write to a track that is given to you, and the musical cues you should listen for.

You will find the information presented is very clear and to the point. To get the most out of this course, you must do all exercises and tips presented. It will take practice, finding inspiration, and developing your ear to create effective material.

Take your time and enjoy the course!
title: Songwriting Process: Write Your Own Songs
